title: How long does it take to learn Paganini's 24th caprice? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ten years of lessons with a very good teacher, practicing on average two hours a day should do it for you. Check back in with me afterwards to see how you did.
It depends entirely upon you and where you are now. Without dedication and regular practice it will be “never" and that honestly is the most anyone can say.
